article:
It's seven forty in the morning. The students are coming into the classroom. A girl is opening the windows. _ of the students are laughing and talking .Some are listening to _ .Some are _ books. Others are doing some cleaning.
Miss Liu is standing behind the _ desk. She is writing _ the blackboard. Sue and Lily are wearing their new dresses today. Ann is cleaning her desk. Mike is helping her. They all _ happy.
 _ are Bill and Jim doing? Oh, dear! They're still playing basketball on the playground ..
